FrontendVideos.Title: Learn Frontend Development with Projects
FrontendVideos.ApplyAtLeast: If you apply at least 5-6 good frontend projects you will be able to do most things that you want if you want to make real projects.

FullstackVideos.Title: Learn Fullstack Development with Projects
FullstackVideos.GetMostBenifits: If you want to apply fullstack projects in the shortest time and get most benefits, you can follow this video
FullstackVideos.ApplyAtLeast: If you apply at least 3-4 good fullstack projects you will be able to do most things that you want if you want to make real projects.
